message: I'll take the lion's share, but you get a nice little bonus to start.  Let's see if you're willing to play ball.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a more equitable split. Take this offer, or the pot shrinks further.
Okay, I'm willing to be more fair.  But we both need to be reasonable if we want to see any real money in our pockets. This is my final offer.
